data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Tanintharyi, Myanmar (Burma) a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tanintharyi, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Tanintharyi. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Tanintharyi, Myanmar (Burma) to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Tanintharyi, Myanmar (Burma) to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Moken, Salon people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Moken, Salon people.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Tanintharyi who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Tanintharyi with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who are far from you in Tanintharyi. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
